data.comment: The big names in today's match at Orange Velodrome have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 2, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Florian Thauvin.
Valentin Rongier instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Marseille.
In the minute 7, Marseille's Mickael Cuisance is on target but unsuccessful.
Dario Benedetto for Marseille drives towards goal at Orange Velodrome. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 7, Mikael Lesage awards Nantes a goal kick.
Free kick Marseille.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
Dario Benedetto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Marseille.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Marseille just outside Nantes's area.
In the minute 13, Marseille's Florian Thauvin gets in a shot on goal at Orange Velodrome. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Nantes at Orange Velodrome.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nantes.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 22, Marseille drives forward and Dimitri Payet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
The match at Orange Velodrome has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alban Lafont, who is down injured.
In the minute 24, Nantes's Alban Lafont looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Marseille.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Marseille in their own half.
Marseille are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Marseille in their own half.
Marseille needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Marseille.
In the minute 33, Marseille surge into the attack at Orange Velodrome but Boubacar Kamara’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 34, Marseille drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Mikael Lesage signals a Nantes throw-in in Marseille's half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 35, It's now 2-0 in Marseille as Dimitri Payet scores for Marseille.
Mickael Cuisance with an assist there.
Ball safe as Marseille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikael Lesage signals a Nantes throw-in in Marseille's half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 41, Abdoulaye Toure hits the bar with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Nantes in Marseille.
In Marseille Nantes drive forward through Pedro Chirivella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Attention is being given to Marseille’s Alvaro Gonzalez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 43, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marseille’s Alvaro Gonzalez is on his feet again at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 45, Marseille are pushing forward but Mickael Cuisance's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Nantes at Orange Velodrome.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Marseille territory.
In the minute 45, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Marseille's half?
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Nantes are coming forward and Fabio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Mikael Lesage awards Marseille a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Marseille.
The first-half is over at Orange Velodrome.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
The away team have replaced Imran Louza with Moses Simon. This is the first substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
Dimitri Payet (Marseille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 48, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Boubacar Kamara of Marseille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 49, Marseille's Mickael Cuisance misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in high up the field for Marseille in Marseille.
Marseille have a dangerous throw-in.
Marseille attack but Florian Thauvin's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 53, Nantes have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sebastien Corchia for Nantes who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 54, Valentin Rongier (Marseille) has received a first yellow card.
Sebastien Corchia returns to the field for Nantes after picking up a slight injury.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Marseille in the half of Nantes.
Mikael Lesage waits before resuming play because Abdoulaye Toure for Nantes is still down.
In the minute 57, Abdoulaye Toure has recovered and rejoins the match in Marseille.
Free kick Marseille.
At Orange Velodrome, Jean-Charles Castelletto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Nantes at Orange Velodrome.
Penalty! Mikael Lesage points to the spot, great chance for Marseille...
It's now 3-0 to Marseille as Dario Benedetto scores from the spot.
In the minute 61, Andrei is replacing Jean-Charles Castelletto for Nantes at Orange Velodrome.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's second substitution at Orange Velodrome with Mehdi Abeid replacing Abdoulaye Toure.
Throw-in for Marseille in their own half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Marseille.
Marseille to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 66, Marseille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Marseille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
Mickael Cuisance is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 69, Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Marseille, close to Nantes's area.
Can Marseille capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 71, Marseille's Dario Benedetto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Orange Velodrome.
Mickael Cuisance for Marseille is back on the field again.
In the minute 71, Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nantes.
Alvaro Gonzalez (Marseille) gets a yellow card.
Marseille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Nantes are back in the match in Marseille. Ludovic Blas has scored to make it 3-1.
In the minute 74, Christian Gourcuff (Nantes) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcus Coco replacing Abdoul Kader Bamba.
Jean-Kevin Augustin is on a sub for Randal Kolo Muani for Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 76, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Marseille.
Marseille make their first substitution with Valere Germain replacing Dario Benedetto.
In the minute 77, Kevin Strootman is replacing Valentin Rongier for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Throw-in for Nantes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Marseille.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Marseille at Orange Velodrome.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Free kick for Marseille in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 83, Ludovic Blas is booked for the away team.
Florian Thauvin (Marseille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Mikael Lesage signals a Nantes throw-in in Marseille's half.
Marley Ake is replacing Dimitri Payet for the home team.
Nantes are caught offside.
In the minute 87, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nantes.
The home team replace Hiroki Sakai with Yuto Nagatomo.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Marseille.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Marseille.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Marseille.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nantes's Marcus Coco breaks free at Orange Velodrome. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marseille have a goal kick.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Nantes!
Can Marseille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In Marseille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marseille have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Kevin Strootman (Marseille) has received a yellow card from Mikael Lesage.
